8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Uqbah bin Amir narrated that :The Messenger of Allah said: "The Day of Arafah, the Day of Nahr, and the Days of Tashriq are Eid for us. The people of Islam, and they are days of eating and drinking

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ الصَّوْمِ فِي أَيَّامِ التَّشْرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked To Fast The Days Of Tashriq
